key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and semiconductor shortages
High customer concentration with reliance on a few large customers
Regulatory and legal challenges in highly regulated industries
Competitive pressure in the EMS industry
controversies: Legal disputes related to supply chain disruptions
Employment discrimination claims (Novotny v. Plexus Corp.)
environmental_issues: None significant; company is actively improving sustainability
governance_issues: Insider stock sales raising concerns about management confidence

sources.snippet: Plexus Corp.
